author: m.kalinin
content: 5) is about stopping maintaining vestigial application chain and turning application client into application state maintainer with responsibilities restricted to state downloading, transaction pool and state transition function. But this might be a big change in terms of existing infrastructure as it would remove the guarantee of the history storage in the network (the history beyond the WS period) and probably affects JSON-RPC much. Therefore, additional efforts are required to understand the possibility of such change
